properties.title: Refuge de Chalin CAS
properties.description: One of five accommodations around Dents du Midi and with eight berths it is one of the smallest SAC cabins. Cooking is possible on the wood burning stove and tableware and a fondue pot are available. It is not attended and running water is not available but there is a great view over the entire Chablais and Hau-Lac of Lake Geneva with the Jura in the distance. The access via Dent de Valère and over Arête du Dardeu offers a panoramic view as well.
